# Document Service

Document

This service allows scripts to create, access, and modify Google Docs files.  

    // Open a document by ID.
    var doc = DocumentApp.openById('DOCUMENT_ID');

    // Create and open a document.
    doc = DocumentApp.create('Document Name');

## Classes

|                                                                  Name                                                                  |                                                                                      Brief description                                                                                      |
|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [Attribute](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/attribute)                                                    | An enumeration of the element attributes.                                                                                                                                                   |
| [Body](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body)                                                              | The content of a tab in a Google Docs document.                                                                                                                                             |
| [Bookmark](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/bookmark)                                                      | An object representing a bookmark.                                                                                                                                                          |
| [ContainerElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/container-element)                                     | A generic element that may contain other elements.                                                                                                                                          |
| [Date](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/date)                                                              | An element representing a formatted date                                                                                                                                                    |
| [Document](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document)                                                      | A document, containing one or more [Tab](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/tab) objects, each of which contains rich text and elements such as tables and lists. |
| [DocumentApp](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document-app)                                               | The document service creates and opens [Documents](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document) that can be edited.                                               |
| [DocumentTab](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document-tab)                                               | A document tab, containing rich text and elements such as tables and lists.                                                                                                                 |
| [Element](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element)                                                        | A generic element.                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [ElementType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element-type)                                               | An enumeration of all the element types.                                                                                                                                                    |
| [Equation](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/equation)                                                      | An element representing a mathematical expression.                                                                                                                                          |
| [EquationFunction](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/equation-function)                                     | An element representing a function in a mathematical [Equation](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/equation).                                                     |
| [EquationFunctionArgumentSeparator](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/equation-function-argument-separator) | An element representing a function separator in a mathematical [Equation](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/equation).                                           |
| [EquationSymbol](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/equation-symbol)                                         | An element representing a symbol in a mathematical [Equation](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/equation).                                                       |
| [FontFamily](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/font-family)                                                 | An enumeration of the supported fonts.                                                                                                                                                      |
| [FooterSection](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section)                                           | An element representing a footer section.                                                                                                                                                   |
| [Footnote](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footnote)                                                      | An element representing a footnote.                                                                                                                                                         |
| [FootnoteSection](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footnote-section)                                       | An element representing a footnote section.                                                                                                                                                 |
| [GlyphType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/glyph-type)                                                   | An enumeration of the supported glyph types.                                                                                                                                                |
| [HeaderSection](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/header-section)                                           | An element representing a header section.                                                                                                                                                   |
| [HorizontalAlignment](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/horizontal-alignment)                               | An enumeration of the supported horizontal alignment types.                                                                                                                                 |
| [HorizontalRule](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/horizontal-rule)                                         | An element representing an horizontal rule.                                                                                                                                                 |
| [InlineDrawing](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/inline-drawing)                                           | An element representing an embedded drawing.                                                                                                                                                |
| [InlineImage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/inline-image)                                               | An element representing an embedded image.                                                                                                                                                  |
| [ListItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/list-item)                                                     | An element representing a list item.                                                                                                                                                        |
| [NamedRange](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/named-range)                                                 | A [Range](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range) that has a name and ID to allow later retrieval.                                                              |
| [PageBreak](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/page-break)                                                   | An element representing a page break.                                                                                                                                                       |
| [Paragraph](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/paragraph)                                                    | An element representing a paragraph.                                                                                                                                                        |
| [ParagraphHeading](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/paragraph-heading)                                     | An enumeration of the standard paragraph headings.                                                                                                                                          |
| [Person](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/person)                                                          | An element representing a link to a person.                                                                                                                                                 |
| [Position](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/position)                                                      | A reference to a location in the document tab, relative to a specific element.                                                                                                              |
| [PositionedImage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/positioned-image)                                       | Fixed position image anchored to a [Paragraph](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/paragraph).                                                                     |
| [PositionedLayout](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/positioned-layout)                                     | An enumeration that specifies how to lay out a [PositionedImage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/positioned-image) in relation to surrounding text.            |
| [Range](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range)                                                            | A range of elements in a document.                                                                                                                                                          |
| [RangeBuilder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-builder)                                             | A builder used to construct `Range` objects from document elements.                                                                                                                         |
| [RangeElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-element)                                             | A wrapper around an [Element](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element) with a possible start and end offset.                                                   |
| [RichLink](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/rich-link)                                                     | An element representing a link to a Google resource, such as a Drive file or a YouTube video.                                                                                               |
| [Tab](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/tab)                                                                | A tab within a Google Docs document.                                                                                                                                                        |
| [TabType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/tab-type)                                                       | An enumeration of all the tab types.                                                                                                                                                        |
| [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table)                                                            | An element representing a table.                                                                                                                                                            |
| [TableCell](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-cell)                                                   | An element representing a table cell.                                                                                                                                                       |
| [TableOfContents](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-of-contents)                                      | An element containing a table of contents.                                                                                                                                                  |
| [TableRow](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-row)                                                     | An element representing a table row.                                                                                                                                                        |
| [Text](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/text)                                                              | An element representing a rich text region.                                                                                                                                                 |
| [TextAlignment](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/text-alignment)                                           | An enumeration of the type of text alignments.                                                                                                                                              |
| [UnsupportedElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/unsupported-element)                                 | An element representing a region that is unknown or cannot be affected by a script, such as a page number.                                                                                  |
| [VerticalAlignment](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/vertical-alignment)                                   | An enumeration of the supported vertical alignment types.                                                                                                                                   |

## [Attribute](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/attribute)

### Properties

|        Property        |  Type  |                                                 Description                                                 |
|------------------------|--------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `BACKGROUND_COLOR`     | `Enum` | The background color of an element (Paragraph, Table, etc) or document.                                     |
| `BOLD`                 | `Enum` | The font weight setting, for rich text.                                                                     |
| `BORDER_COLOR`         | `Enum` | The border color, for table elements.                                                                       |
| `BORDER_WIDTH`         | `Enum` | The border width in points, for table elements.                                                             |
| `CODE`                 | `Enum` | The code contents, for equation elements.                                                                   |
| `FONT_FAMILY`          | `Enum` | The font family setting, for rich text.                                                                     |
| `FONT_SIZE`            | `Enum` | The font size setting in points, for rich text.                                                             |
| `FOREGROUND_COLOR`     | `Enum` | The foreground color setting, for rich text.                                                                |
| `HEADING`              | `Enum` | The heading type, for paragraph elements (for example, `Document``App.ParagraphHeading.HEADING1`).          |
| `HEIGHT`               | `Enum` | The height setting, for image elements.                                                                     |
| `HORIZONTAL_ALIGNMENT` | `Enum` | The horizontal alignment, for paragraph elements (for example, `Document``App.HorizontalAlignment.CENTER`). |
| `INDENT_END`           | `Enum` | The end indentation setting in points, for paragraph elements.                                              |
| `INDENT_FIRST_LINE`    | `Enum` | The first line indentation setting in points, for paragraph elements.                                       |
| `INDENT_START`         | `Enum` | The start indentation setting in points, for paragraph elements.                                            |
| `ITALIC`               | `Enum` | The font style setting, for rich text.                                                                      |
| `GLYPH_TYPE`           | `Enum` | The glyph type, for list item elements.                                                                     |
| `LEFT_TO_RIGHT`        | `Enum` | The text direction setting, for rich text.                                                                  |
| `LINE_SPACING`         | `Enum` | The line spacing setting as a multiplier, for paragraph elements.                                           |
| `LINK_URL`             | `Enum` | The link URL, for rich text.                                                                                |
| `LIST_ID`              | `Enum` | The ID of the encompassing list, for list item elements.                                                    |
| `MARGIN_BOTTOM`        | `Enum` | The bottom margin setting in points, for paragraph elements.                                                |
| `MARGIN_LEFT`          | `Enum` | The left margin setting in points, for paragraph elements.                                                  |
| `MARGIN_RIGHT`         | `Enum` | The right margin setting in points, for paragraph elements.                                                 |
| `MARGIN_TOP`           | `Enum` | The top margin setting in points, for paragraph elements.                                                   |
| `NESTING_LEVEL`        | `Enum` | The item nesting level, for list item elements.                                                             |
| `MINIMUM_HEIGHT`       | `Enum` | The minimum height setting in points, for table row elements.                                               |
| `PADDING_BOTTOM`       | `Enum` | The bottom padding setting in points, for table cell elements.                                              |
| `PADDING_LEFT`         | `Enum` | The left padding setting in points, for table cell elements.                                                |
| `PADDING_RIGHT`        | `Enum` | The right padding setting in points, for table cell elements.                                               |
| `PADDING_TOP`          | `Enum` | The top padding setting in points, for table cell elements.                                                 |
| `PAGE_HEIGHT`          | `Enum` | The page height setting in points, for documents.                                                           |
| `PAGE_WIDTH`           | `Enum` | The page width setting in points, for documents.                                                            |
| `SPACING_AFTER`        | `Enum` | The bottom spacing setting in points, for paragraph elements.                                               |
| `SPACING_BEFORE`       | `Enum` | The top spacing setting in points, for paragraph elements.                                                  |
| `STRIKETHROUGH`        | `Enum` | The strike-through setting, for rich text.                                                                  |
| `UNDERLINE`            | `Enum` | The underline setting, for rich text.                                                                       |
| `VERTICAL_ALIGNMENT`   | `Enum` | The vertical alignment setting, for table cell elements.                                                    |
| `WIDTH`                | `Enum` | The width setting, for table cell and image elements.                                                       |

## [Body](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body)

### Methods

|                                                                                Method                                                                                 |                                            Return type                                             |                                                                                                        Brief description                                                                                                         |
|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [appendHorizontalRule()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#appendHorizontalRule())                                                    | [HorizontalRule](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/horizontal-rule)     | Creates and appends a new [HorizontalRule](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/horizontal-rule).                                                                                                        |
| [appendImage(image)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#appendImage(BlobSource))                                                       | [InlineImage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/inline-image)           | Creates and appends a new [InlineImage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/inline-image) from the specified image blob.                                                                                |
| [appendImage(image)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#appendImage(InlineImage))                                                      | [InlineImage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/inline-image)           | Appends the given [InlineImage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/inline-image).                                                                                                                      |
| [appendListItem(listItem)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#appendListItem(ListItem))                                                | [ListItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/list-item)                 | Appends the given [ListItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/list-item).                                                                                                                            |
| [appendListItem(text)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#appendListItem(String))                                                      | [ListItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/list-item)                 | Creates and appends a new [ListItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/list-item) containing the specified text contents.                                                                             |
| [appendPageBreak()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#appendPageBreak())                                                              | [PageBreak](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/page-break)               | Creates and appends a new [PageBreak](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/page-break).                                                                                                                  |
| [appendPageBreak(pageBreak)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#appendPageBreak(PageBreak))                                            | [PageBreak](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/page-break)               | Appends the given [PageBreak](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/page-break).                                                                                                                          |
| [appendParagraph(paragraph)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#appendParagraph(Paragraph))                                            | [Paragraph](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/paragraph)                | Appends the given [Paragraph](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/paragraph).                                                                                                                           |
| [appendParagraph(text)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#appendParagraph(String))                                                    | [Paragraph](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/paragraph)                | Creates and appends a new [Paragraph](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/paragraph) containing the specified text contents.                                                                            |
| [appendTable()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#appendTable())                                                                      | [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table)                        | Creates and appends a new [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table).                                                                                                                           |
| [appendTable(cells)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#appendTable(String))                                                           | [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table)                        | Appends a new [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table) containing a [TableCell](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-cell) for each specified string value.     |
| [appendTable(table)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#appendTable(Table))                                                            | [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table)                        | Appends the given [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table).                                                                                                                                   |
| [clear()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#clear())                                                                                  | [Body](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body)                          | Clears the contents of the element.                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [copy()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#copy())                                                                                    | [Body](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body)                          | Returns a detached, deep copy of the current element.                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [editAsText()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#editAsText())                                                                        | [Text](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/text)                          | Obtains a [Text](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/text) version of the current element, for editing.                                                                                                 |
| [findElement(elementType)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#findElement(ElementType))                                                | [RangeElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-element)         | Searches the contents of the element for a descendant of the specified type.                                                                                                                                                     |
| [findElement(elementType, from)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#findElement(ElementType,RangeElement))                             | [RangeElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-element)         | Searches the contents of the element for a descendant of the specified type, starting from the specified [RangeElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-element).                             |
| [findText(searchPattern)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#findText(String))                                                         | [RangeElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-element)         | Searches the contents of the element for the specified text pattern using regular expressions.                                                                                                                                   |
| [findText(searchPattern, from)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#findText(String,RangeElement))                                      | [RangeElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-element)         | Searches the contents of the element for the specified text pattern, starting from a given search result.                                                                                                                        |
| [getAttributes()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#getAttributes())                                                                  | `Object`                                                                                           | Retrieves the element's attributes.                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [getChild(childIndex)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#getChild(Integer))                                                           | [Element](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element)                    | Retrieves the child element at the specified child index.                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [getChildIndex(child)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#getChildIndex(Element))                                                      | `Integer`                                                                                          | Retrieves the child index for the specified child element.                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [getHeadingAttributes(paragraphHeading)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#getHeadingAttributes(ParagraphHeading))                    | `Object`                                                                                           | Retrieves the set of attributes for the provided `Paragraph``Heading`.                                                                                                                                                           |
| [getImages()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#getImages())                                                                          | [InlineImage[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/inline-image)         | Retrieves all the [InlineImages](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/inline-image) contained in the section.                                                                                            |
| [getListItems()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#getListItems())                                                                    | [ListItem[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/list-item)               | Retrieves all the [ListItems](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/list-item) contained in the section.                                                                                                  |
| [getMarginBottom()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#getMarginBottom())                                                              | `Number`                                                                                           | Retrieves the bottom margin, in points.                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [getMarginLeft()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#getMarginLeft())                                                                  | `Number`                                                                                           | Retrieves the left margin, in points.                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [getMarginRight()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#getMarginRight())                                                                | `Number`                                                                                           | Retrieves the right margin.                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [getMarginTop()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#getMarginTop())                                                                    | `Number`                                                                                           | Retrieves the top margin.                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [getNumChildren()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#getNumChildren())                                                                | `Integer`                                                                                          | Retrieves the number of children.                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [getPageHeight()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#getPageHeight())                                                                  | `Number`                                                                                           | Retrieves the page height, in points.                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [getPageWidth()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#getPageWidth())                                                                    | `Number`                                                                                           | Retrieves the page width, in points.                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [getParagraphs()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#getParagraphs())                                                                  | [Paragraph[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/paragraph)              | Retrieves all the [Paragraphs](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/paragraph) contained in the section (including [ListItems](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/list-item)). |
| [getParent()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#getParent())                                                                          | [ContainerElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/container-element) | Retrieves the element's parent element.                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [getTables()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#getTables())                                                                          | [Table[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table)                      | Retrieves all the [Tables](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table) contained in the section.                                                                                                         |
| [getText()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#getText())                                                                              | `String`                                                                                           | Retrieves the contents of the element as a text string.                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [getTextAlignment()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#getTextAlignment())                                                            | [TextAlignment](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/text-alignment)       | Gets the text alignment.                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [getType()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#getType())                                                                              | [ElementType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element-type)           | Retrieves the element's [ElementType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element-type).                                                                                                                |
| [insertHorizontalRule(childIndex)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#insertHorizontalRule(Integer))                                   | [HorizontalRule](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/horizontal-rule)     | Creates and inserts a new [HorizontalRule](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/horizontal-rule) at the specified index.                                                                                 |

| [insertListItem(childIndex, text)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#insertListItem(Integer,String))                                  | [ListItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/list-item)                 | Creates and inserts a new [ListItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/list-item) at the specified index, containing the specified text contents.                                                     |
| [insertPageBreak(childIndex)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#insertPageBreak(Integer))                                             | [PageBreak](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/page-break)               | Creates and inserts a new [PageBreak](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/page-break) at the specified index.                                                                                           |
| [insertPageBreak(childIndex, pageBreak)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#insertPageBreak(Integer,PageBreak))                        | [PageBreak](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/page-break)               | Inserts the given [PageBreak](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/page-break) at the specified index.                                                                                                   |
| [insertParagraph(childIndex, paragraph)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#insertParagraph(Integer,Paragraph))                        | [Paragraph](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/paragraph)                | Inserts the given [Paragraph](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/paragraph) at the specified index.                                                                                                    |
| [insertParagraph(childIndex, text)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/body#insertParagraph(Integer,String))                                | [Paragraph](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/paragraph)                | Creates and inserts a new [Paragraph](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/paragraph) at the specified index, containing the specified text contents.                                                    |

| [getCursor()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document#getCursor())                                   | [Position](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/position)            | Gets the user's cursor in the active tab.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |

| [getFooter()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document#getFooter())                                   | [FooterSection](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section) | Retrieves the first tab's footer section or, for scripts that are [bound](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/scripts_containers) to a document, the active tab's footer section.                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [getFootnotes()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document#getFootnotes())                             | [Footnote[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footnote)          | Retrieves all the [Footnote](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footnote) elements in the first tab's body or, for scripts that are [bound](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/scripts_containers) to a document, the active tab's body.                                                                                                               |
| [getHeader()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document#getHeader())                                   | [HeaderSection](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/header-section) | Retrieves the first tab's header section or, for scripts that are [bound](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/scripts_containers) to a document, the active tab's header section.                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [getId()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document#getId())                                           | `String`                                                                                     | Retrieves the document's unique identifier.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [getLanguage()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document#getLanguage())                               | `String`                                                                                     | Gets the document's language code.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [getName()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document#getName())                                       | `String`                                                                                     | Retrieves the title of the document.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [getNamedRangeById(id)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document#getNamedRangeById(String))           | [NamedRange](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/named-range)       | Gets the [NamedRange](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/named-range) with the given ID in the first tab or, for scripts that are [bound](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/scripts_containers) to a document, the active tab.                                                                                                                        |
| [getNamedRanges()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document#getNamedRanges())                         | [NamedRange[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/named-range)     | Gets all [NamedRange](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/named-range) objects in the first tab or, for scripts that are [bound](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/scripts_containers) to a document, the active tab.                                                                                                                                  |
| [getNamedRanges(name)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document#getNamedRanges(String))               | [NamedRange[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/named-range)     | Gets all [NamedRange](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/named-range) objects with the given name in the first tab or, for scripts that are [bound](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/scripts_containers) to a document, the active tab.                                                                                                              |
| [getSelection()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document#getSelection())                             | [Range](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range)                  | Gets the user's selection in the active tab.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [getSupportedLanguageCodes()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document#getSupportedLanguageCodes())   | `String[]`                                                                                   | Gets all language codes that are supported in Google Docs files.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [getTab(tabId)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document#getTab(String))                              | [Tab](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/tab)                      | Gets the [Tab](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/tab) with the specified ID.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [getTabs()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document#getTabs())                                       | [Tab[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/tab)                    | Gets all unnested [Tab](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/tab)s that are part of the document.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [getUrl()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document#getUrl())                                         | `String`                                                                                     | Retrieves the URL to access the current document.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [getViewers()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document#getViewers())                                 | [User[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/base/user.html)                           | Gets the list of viewers and commenters for this [Document](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [newPosition(element, offset)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document#newPosition(Element,Integer)) | [Position](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/position)            | Creates a new [Position](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/position), which is a reference to a location in the tab, relative to a specific element in the first tab or, for scripts that are [bound](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/scripts_containers) to a document, the active tab.                                                           |
| [newRange()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document#newRange())                                     | [RangeBuilder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-builder)   | Creates a builder used to construct [Range](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range) objects from tab elements in the first tab or, for scripts that are [bound](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/scripts_containers) to a document, the active tab.                                                                                                |
| [removeEditor(emailAddress)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document#removeEditor(String))           | [Document](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document)            | Removes the given user from the list of editors for the [Document](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [removeEditor(user)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document#removeEditor(User))                     | [Document](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document)            | Removes the given user from the list of editors for the [Document](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [removeViewer(emailAddress)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document#removeViewer(String))           | [Document](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document)            | Removes the given user from the list of viewers and commenters for the [Document](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document).                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [removeViewer(user)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document#removeViewer(User))                     | [Document](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document)            | Removes the given user from the list of viewers and commenters for the [Document](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document).                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [saveAndClose()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document#saveAndClose())                             | `void`                                                                                       | Saves the current `Document`.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| [setActiveTab(tabId)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document#setActiveTab(String))                  | `void`                                                                                       | Sets the user's selected [Tab](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/tab) in the current document to the tab with the specified ID.                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |

|                                                                    Method                                                                     |                                            Return type                                             |                                                                                          Brief description                                                                                           |
|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|

| [findElement(elementType)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/equation#findElement(ElementType))                    | [RangeElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-element)         | Searches the contents of the element for a descendant of the specified type.                                                                                                                         |

## [FooterSection](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section)

### Methods

|                                                                          Method                                                                          |                                            Return type                                             |                                                                                                        Brief description                                                                                                         |
|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [appendHorizontalRule()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#appendHorizontalRule())                             | [HorizontalRule](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/horizontal-rule)     | Creates and appends a new [HorizontalRule](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/horizontal-rule).                                                                                                        |
| [appendImage(image)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#appendImage(BlobSource))                                | [InlineImage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/inline-image)           | Creates and appends a new [InlineImage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/inline-image) from the specified image blob.                                                                                |
| [appendImage(image)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#appendImage(InlineImage))                               | [InlineImage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/inline-image)           | Appends the given [InlineImage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/inline-image).                                                                                                                      |
| [appendListItem(listItem)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#appendListItem(ListItem))                         | [ListItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/list-item)                 | Appends the given [ListItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/list-item).                                                                                                                            |
| [appendListItem(text)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#appendListItem(String))                               | [ListItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/list-item)                 | Creates and appends a new [ListItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/list-item) containing the specified text contents.                                                                             |
| [appendParagraph(paragraph)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#appendParagraph(Paragraph))                     | [Paragraph](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/paragraph)                | Appends the given [Paragraph](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/paragraph).                                                                                                                           |
| [appendParagraph(text)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#appendParagraph(String))                             | [Paragraph](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/paragraph)                | Creates and appends a new [Paragraph](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/paragraph) containing the specified text contents.                                                                            |
| [appendTable()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#appendTable())                                               | [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table)                        | Creates and appends a new [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table).                                                                                                                           |
| [appendTable(cells)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#appendTable(String))                                    | [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table)                        | Appends a new [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table) containing a [TableCell](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-cell) for each specified string value.     |
| [appendTable(table)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#appendTable(Table))                                     | [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table)                        | Appends the given [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table).                                                                                                                                   |
| [clear()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#clear())                                                           | [FooterSection](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section)       | Clears the contents of the element.                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [copy()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#copy())                                                             | [FooterSection](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section)       | Returns a detached, deep copy of the current element.                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [editAsText()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#editAsText())                                                 | [Text](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/text)                          | Obtains a [Text](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/text) version of the current element, for editing.                                                                                                 |
| [findElement(elementType)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#findElement(ElementType))                         | [RangeElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-element)         | Searches the contents of the element for a descendant of the specified type.                                                                                                                                                     |
| [findElement(elementType, from)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#findElement(ElementType,RangeElement))      | [RangeElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-element)         | Searches the contents of the element for a descendant of the specified type, starting from the specified [RangeElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-element).                             |
| [findText(searchPattern)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#findText(String))                                  | [RangeElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-element)         | Searches the contents of the element for the specified text pattern using regular expressions.                                                                                                                                   |
| [findText(searchPattern, from)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#findText(String,RangeElement))               | [RangeElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-element)         | Searches the contents of the element for the specified text pattern, starting from a given search result.                                                                                                                        |

| [getChildIndex(child)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#getChildIndex(Element))                               | `Integer`                                                                                          | Retrieves the child index for the specified child element.                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [getImages()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#getImages())                                                   | [InlineImage[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/inline-image)         | Retrieves all the [InlineImages](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/inline-image) contained in the section.                                                                                            |
| [getListItems()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#getListItems())                                             | [ListItem[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/list-item)               | Retrieves all the [ListItems](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/list-item) contained in the section.                                                                                                  |
| [getNumChildren()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#getNumChildren())                                         | `Integer`                                                                                          | Retrieves the number of children.                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [getParagraphs()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#getParagraphs())                                           | [Paragraph[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/paragraph)              | Retrieves all the [Paragraphs](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/paragraph) contained in the section (including [ListItems](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/list-item)). |
| [getParent()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#getParent())                                                   | [ContainerElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/container-element) | Retrieves the element's parent element.                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [getTables()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#getTables())                                                   | [Table[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table)                      | Retrieves all the [Tables](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table) contained in the section.                                                                                                         |
| [getText()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#getText())                                                       | `String`                                                                                           | Retrieves the contents of the element as a text string.                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [getTextAlignment()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#getTextAlignment())                                     | [TextAlignment](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/text-alignment)       | Gets the text alignment.                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [getType()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#getType())                                                       | [ElementType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element-type)           | Retrieves the element's [ElementType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element-type).                                                                                                                |

| [insertImage(childIndex, image)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footer-section#insertImage(Integer,InlineImage))           | [InlineImage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/inline-image)           | Inserts the given [InlineImage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/inline-image) at the specified index.                                                                                               |
