## [Footnote](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footnote)

### Methods

|                                                          Method                                                          |                                            Return type                                             |                                                           Brief description                                                            |
|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [copy()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footnote#copy())                                   | [Footnote](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footnote)                  | Returns a detached, deep copy of the current element.                                                                                  |
| [getAttributes()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footnote#getAttributes())                 | `Object`                                                                                           | Retrieves the element's attributes.                                                                                                    |
| [getFootnoteContents()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footnote#getFootnoteContents())     | [FootnoteSection](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footnote-section)   | Retrieves the contents of the footnote element.                                                                                        |
| [getNextSibling()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footnote#getNextSibling())               | [Element](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element)                    | Retrieves the element's next sibling element.                                                                                          |
| [getParent()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footnote#getParent())                         | [ContainerElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/container-element) | Retrieves the element's parent element.                                                                                                |
| [getPreviousSibling()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footnote#getPreviousSibling())       | [Element](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element)                    | Retrieves the element's previous sibling element.                                                                                      |
| [getType()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footnote#getType())                             | [ElementType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element-type)           | Retrieves the element's [ElementType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element-type).                      |
| [isAtDocumentEnd()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footnote#isAtDocumentEnd())             | `Boolean`                                                                                          | Determines whether the element is at the end of the [Document](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document). |
| [removeFromParent()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footnote#removeFromParent())           | [Footnote](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footnote)                  | Removes the element from its parent.                                                                                                   |
| [setAttributes(attributes)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footnote#setAttributes(Object)) | [Footnote](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/footnote)                  | Sets the element's attributes.                                                                                                         |

## [GlyphType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/glyph-type)

### Properties

|    Property     |  Type  |               Description                |
|-----------------|--------|------------------------------------------|
| `BULLET`        | `Enum` | The default bullet, circular and filled. |
| `HOLLOW_BULLET` | `Enum` | A hollow bullet.                         |
| `SQUARE_BULLET` | `Enum` | A square bullet.                         |
| `NUMBER`        | `Enum` | A number based bullet.                   |
| `LATIN_UPPER`   | `Enum` | A latin, uppercase bullet.               |
| `LATIN_LOWER`   | `Enum` | A latin, lowercase bullet.               |
| `ROMAN_UPPER`   | `Enum` | A roman numeral, uppercase bullet.       |
| `ROMAN_LOWER`   | `Enum` | A roman numeral, lowercase bullet.       |

## [HeaderSection](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/header-section)

### Methods

|                                                                          Method                                                                          |                                            Return type                                             |                                                                                                        Brief description                                                                                                         |
|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|

## [HorizontalAlignment](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/horizontal-alignment)

### Properties

| Property  |  Type  |          Description          |
|-----------|--------|-------------------------------|
| `LEFT`    | `Enum` | The left-alignment option.    |
| `CENTER`  | `Enum` | The center-alignment option.  |
| `RIGHT`   | `Enum` | The right-alignment option.   |
| `JUSTIFY` | `Enum` | The justify-alignment option. |

|                                              Method                                               |                                 Return type                                 |                        Brief description                        |
|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------|
| [getId()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/named-range#getId())       | `String`                                                                    | Gets the ID of this `Named``Range`.                             |
| [getName()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/named-range#getName())   | `String`                                                                    | Gets the name of this `Named``Range`.                           |
| [getRange()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/named-range#getRange()) | [Range](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range) | Gets the range of elements associated with this `Named``Range`. |
| [remove()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/named-range#remove())     | `void`                                                                      | Removes this `Named``Range` from the tab.                       |

## [ParagraphHeading](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/paragraph-heading)

### Properties

|  Property  |  Type  |             Description             |
|------------|--------|-------------------------------------|
| `NORMAL`   | `Enum` | The heading option for normal text. |
| `HEADING1` | `Enum` | The highest heading option.         |
| `HEADING2` | `Enum` | The second heading option.          |
| `HEADING3` | `Enum` | The third heading option            |
| `HEADING4` | `Enum` | The fourth heading option.          |
| `HEADING5` | `Enum` | The fifth heading option.           |
| `HEADING6` | `Enum` | The lowest heading option.          |
| `TITLE`    | `Enum` | The title heading option.           |
| `SUBTITLE` | `Enum` | The subtitle heading option.        |

## [PositionedLayout](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/positioned-layout)

### Properties

|   Property    |  Type  |                   Description                    |
|---------------|--------|--------------------------------------------------|
| `ABOVE_TEXT`  | `Enum` | The image is positioned above the text.          |
| `BREAK_BOTH`  | `Enum` | The image breaks the text on the left and right. |
| `BREAK_LEFT`  | `Enum` | The image breaks the text on the left.           |
| `BREAK_RIGHT` | `Enum` | The image breaks the text on the right.          |
| `WRAP_TEXT`   | `Enum` | The image is wrapped by text.                    |

| [getRangeElements()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range#getRangeElements()) | [RangeElement[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-element) | Gets all elements in this `Range`, including any partial [Text](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/text) elements (for example, in the case of a selection that includes only part of a `Text` element). |

## [RangeBuilder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-builder)

### Methods

|                                                                                                           Method                                                                                                           |                                         Return type                                          |                                                                                                         Brief description                                                                                                          |
|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [addElement(element)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-builder#addElement(Element))                                                                                                      | [RangeBuilder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-builder)   | Adds an entire [Element](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element) to this `Range``Builder`.                                                                                                           |
| [addElement(textElement, startOffset, endOffsetInclusive)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-builder#addElement(Text,Integer,Integer))                                                    | [RangeBuilder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-builder)   | Adds a partial [Text](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/text) element to this `Range``Builder`.                                                                                                         |
| [addElementsBetween(startElement, endElementInclusive)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-builder#addElementsBetween(Element,Element))                                                    | [RangeBuilder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-builder)   | Adds two entire elements, and all elements between them, to this `Range``Builder`.                                                                                                                                                 |
| [addElementsBetween(startTextElement, startOffset, endTextElementInclusive, endOffsetInclusive)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-builder#addElementsBetween(Text,Integer,Text,Integer)) | [RangeBuilder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-builder)   | Adds two partial [Text](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/text) elements, and all elements between them, to the `Range``Builder`.                                                                       |
| [addRange(range)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-builder#addRange(Range))                                                                                                              | [RangeBuilder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-builder)   | Adds the contents of another `Range` to this `Range``Builder`.                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [build()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-builder#build())                                                                                                                              | [Range](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range)                  | Constructs a `Range` from the settings applied to the builder.                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [getRangeElements()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-builder#getRangeElements())                                                                                                        | [RangeElement[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-element) | Gets all elements in this `Range`, including any partial [Text](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/text) elements (for example, in the case of a selection that includes only part of a `Text` element). |

## [TableOfContents](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-of-contents)

### Methods

|                                                                         Method                                                                         |                                            Return type                                             |                                                                                          Brief description                                                                                           |
|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [clear()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-of-contents#clear())                                                      | [TableOfContents](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-of-contents)  | Clears the contents of the element.                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [copy()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-of-contents#copy())                                                        | [TableOfContents](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-of-contents)  | Returns a detached, deep copy of the current element.                                                                                                                                                |
| [editAsText()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-of-contents#editAsText())                                            | [Text](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/text)                          | Obtains a [Text](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/text) version of the current element, for editing.                                                                     |
| [findElement(elementType)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-of-contents#findElement(ElementType))                    | [RangeElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-element)         | Searches the contents of the element for a descendant of the specified type.                                                                                                                         |
| [findElement(elementType, from)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-of-contents#findElement(ElementType,RangeElement)) | [RangeElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-element)         | Searches the contents of the element for a descendant of the specified type, starting from the specified [RangeElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-element). |
| [findText(searchPattern)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-of-contents#findText(String))                             | [RangeElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-element)         | Searches the contents of the element for the specified text pattern using regular expressions.                                                                                                       |
| [findText(searchPattern, from)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-of-contents#findText(String,RangeElement))          | [RangeElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-element)         | Searches the contents of the element for the specified text pattern, starting from a given search result.                                                                                            |
| [getAttributes()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-of-contents#getAttributes())                                      | `Object`                                                                                           | Retrieves the element's attributes.                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [getChild(childIndex)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-of-contents#getChild(Integer))                               | [Element](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element)                    | Retrieves the child element at the specified child index.                                                                                                                                            |
| [getChildIndex(child)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-of-contents#getChildIndex(Element))                          | `Integer`                                                                                          | Retrieves the child index for the specified child element.                                                                                                                                           |

| [getNumChildren()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-of-contents#getNumChildren())                                    | `Integer`                                                                                          | Retrieves the number of children.                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [getParent()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-of-contents#getParent())                                              | [ContainerElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/container-element) | Retrieves the element's parent element.                                                                                                                                                              |
| [getPreviousSibling()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-of-contents#getPreviousSibling())                            | [Element](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element)                    | Retrieves the element's previous sibling element.                                                                                                                                                    |
| [getText()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-of-contents#getText())                                                  | `String`                                                                                           | Retrieves the contents of the element as a text string.                                                                                                                                              |
| [getTextAlignment()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-of-contents#getTextAlignment())                                | [TextAlignment](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/text-alignment)       | Gets the text alignment.                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [getType()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-of-contents#getType())                                                  | [ElementType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element-type)           | Retrieves the element's [ElementType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element-type).                                                                                    |

## [TextAlignment](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/text-alignment)

### Properties

|   Property    |  Type  |           Description           |
|---------------|--------|---------------------------------|
| `NORMAL`      | `Enum` | The normal text alignment.      |
| `SUPERSCRIPT` | `Enum` | The superscript text alignment. |
| `SUBSCRIPT`   | `Enum` | The subscript text alignment.   |

## [VerticalAlignment](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/vertical-alignment)

### Properties

| Property |  Type  |         Description          |
|----------|--------|------------------------------|
| `BOTTOM` | `Enum` | The bottom-alignment option. |
| `CENTER` | `Enum` | The center-alignment option. |
| `TOP`    | `Enum` | The top-alignment option.    |
